segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, creating a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how quickly the water is spreading.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of urgency, knowing that someone could slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely unaware of the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for her to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are so focused on the cookies, they don't see the water either.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit disgusted at the thought of the water damaging the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is filled with a sense of impending doom.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices the water soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm outside and the chaos inside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR
